description: Source file implementing handling of basic JSON types with Open vSwitch (OVS) support, including conversion between JSON and internal OVS types, with support for optional and required types, for internal use in a larger project.

methods.name: bool pjs_ovs_basic_q_from_json(pjs_type_from_json_t * t_from_json,void * t_data,bool * exists,bool * present,json_t * js,const char * name,bool update,pjs_errmsg_t err)
methods.description: Converts optional JSON value to an OVS basic type (set with max length 1).

methods.name: bool pjs_ovs_basic_from_json(pjs_type_from_json_t * t_from_json,void * t_data,bool * exists,bool * present,json_t * js,const char * name,bool update,pjs_errmsg_t err)
methods.description: Converts required JSON value to an OVS basic type.

methods.name: bool pjs_ovs_basic_q_to_json(pjs_type_to_json_t * t_to_json,void * t_data,bool exists,json_t * js,const char * name,pjs_errmsg_t err)
methods.description: Converts an optional OVS basic type to JSON.
